description: Detects PowerShell commands that decrypt an ".LNK" "file to drop the next stage of the malware.
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: PowerShell Execution With Potential Decryption Capabilities
query: (process.executable:(/.*\\\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:(/[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/) AND process.command_line:(/.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Cc][Hh][Ii][Ll][Dd][Ii][Tt][Ee][Mm]\ .*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Rr]\ .*/ OR /.*[Gg][Cc][Ii]\ .*/ OR /.*[Ll][Ss]\ .*/) AND process.command_line:(/.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\ .*/ OR /.*[Gg][Cc]\ .*/ OR /.*[Cc][Aa][Tt]\ .*/ OR /.*[Tt][Yy][Pp][Ee]\ .*/) AND process.command_line:/.*\ \^|\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\\\\\*\.[Ll][Nn][Kk].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\-[Rr][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ss][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\-[Ss][Kk][Ii][Pp]\ .*/)
